import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import PageContainer from'../components/layout/PageContainer';import ReportUploader from'../components/reports/ReportUploader';import UploadProgress from'../components/reports/UploadProgress';import{useState}from'react';import Card from'../components/common/Card';import Button from'../components/common/Button';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReportUploadPage=()=>{const[uploadedReportId,setUploadedReportId]=useState(null);const[uploadComplete,setUploadComplete]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();// Handle upload success
const handleUploadSuccess=reportId=>{setUploadedReportId(reportId);};// Handle processing complete
const handleProcessingComplete=()=>{setUploadComplete(true);};// Handle view report
const handleViewReport=()=>{if(uploadedReportId){navigate(`/reports/${uploadedReportId}`);}};// Handle upload another

You can now view the detailed analysis, insights, and recommendations."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-3 justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:handleViewReport,children:"View Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline",onClick:handleUploadAnother,children:"Upload Another Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"text",onClick:handleGoToReports,children:"Go to Reports List"})]})]})})})});};export default ReportUploadPage;
